Class Airline.UF

  • java.lang.Object
    • Airline.UF
  • Enclosing class:
    Airline

    public static class Airline.UF
extends java.lang.Object
    This is code from the Author Robert Sedgewick and Kevin Wayne Code can be obtained at http://algs4.cs.princeton.edu/home/ Code for UnionFind from the textbook

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UF(int N)
      Initializes an empty union-find data structure with N isolated components 0 through N-1

      Returns the number of components.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UF

        public UF(int N)
        Initializes an empty union-find data structure with N isolated components 0 through N-1
        Parameters:
        N - the number of sites
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if N < 0

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public int find(int p)
        Returns the component identifier for the component containing site p.
        Parameters:
        p - the integer representing one object
        Returns:
        the component identifier for the component containing site p
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - unless 0 ≤ p < N

      • count

        public int count()
        Returns the number of components.
        Returns:
        the number of components (between 1 and N)

      • connected

        public boolean connected(int p,
                         int q)
        Are the two sites p and q in the same component?
        Parameters:
        p - the integer representing one site
        q - the integer representing the other site
        Returns:
        true if the two sites p and q are in the same component; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - unless both 0 ≤ p < N and 0 ≤ q < N

      • union

        public void union(int p,
                  int q)
        Merges the component containing site p with the the component containing site q.
        Parameters:
        p - the integer representing one site
        q - the integer representing the other site
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - unless both 0 ≤ p < N and 0 ≤ q < N
